title: [REFACTOR] Standardize API calls through service layer
body:
## Problem
Mixed patterns between direct axios calls and service layer usage.

## Tasks
- [ ] Audit all API calls
- [ ] Create consistent service interfaces
- [ ] Migrate direct axios calls
- [ ] Add request/response interceptors
- [ ] Implement retry logic
- [ ] Add comprehensive error handling

## Acceptance Criteria
- No direct axios imports in components
- All API calls through services
- Consistent error handling
- Request retry logic

## Priority: MEDIUM
## Effort: 8 story points
